questions.title: Where should I stay in Hua-Hin?
questions.detail: I'm visiting Hua-Hin in January for a week. I'm looking for beach front bungalow with reasonable price.

questions.title: When is 'Water Festival'?
questions.detail: Hi, I want to visit Thailand during water festival. Can you tell me when is the festival

answers.author: Talay Siam
answers.reply: Anantara Hua Hin Resort is very nice, with Thai traditional decor. Reasonable price during off season (July-September) is around $93

answers.author: Siam007
answers.reply: The water festival or 'Song-Kran' starts on April 13th through the 15th. You'll get water splash any time, anywhere. It's very fun so bring your water gun! Warning!!! This is the hotest month of the year so make sure you are hydrated and ready to play
